name: middle_east
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nomad_list_cities.
Tool description: Explore best cities to live for digital nomads! Sort by internet speed, cost of living and more! Filter by continents
API description: Get Middle East cities sorted by overall score by default.

Pagination: size & page 
sort_by: you can sort by any numeric value like fore example internet_speed, temperatureC, cost_for_family_in_usd and so on.
sort: asc | desc

page.description: The page number for pagination. Default is '1'.

sort.description: The sort order, either 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Default is 'desc'.

sort_by.description: The parameter by which to sort results, such as 'overall_score', 'internet_speed', 'temperatureC', or 'cost_for_family_in_usd'. Default is 'overall_score'.

size.description: The number of entries per page. Default is '20'.
